stitch flat mult of 2 positive ease please see schematic for more detailed row 1 rs k1 *p1 k1 repeat from * to 1 st rem k1 finished measurements row 2 ws p1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to 1 st rem p1 skills row 3 k1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to 1 st rem k1 cables from charts mattress stitch short row shaping row 4 p1 *p1 k1 repeat from * to 1 st rem p1 repeat row 1 4 for patt worthy of note the winter sweater is a heavily cabled raglan pullover knit in pieces from the bottom up the sleeves are worked in moss stitch and the back left front and right front are worked in cable patterns with moss stitch on the sides useful tips the raglans are shaped
